entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High 11. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 5. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 70 percent chance of rain showers or ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016
